name: Space Pilot
description:
Space Pilot (Space-Pilot on the title screen) is a 2D scrolling shooter game for the Commodore 64 published by Kingsoft GmbH in 1984. Space Pilot is a direct clone of Time Pilot, a 1982 arcade game by Konami.

A sequel, Space-Pilot II, was released in 1985 and is a clone of Konami's Time Pilot sequel, Time Pilot '84. The sequel abandons the historical setting and instead uses a top-down view of a futuristic science fiction scenario.
